BENTOCORD_COMMANDMANAGER_ERROR: An error occured while executing this command: `{error}`
BENTOCORD_COMMANDMANAGER_MISSING_PERMS:
Command cannot be executed. The following permissions must be granted:
```{permissions}```
BENTOCORD_COMMAND_HELP_DESCRIPTION: Learn about commands and features Ayana supports
BENTOCORD_COMMAND_PING_DESCRIPTION: Check if the bot is online
BENTOCORD_HELP_NOT_FOUND: Failed to find relevant help for input
BENTOCORD_HELP_USAGE:
`help commandName` - Command Details
`help commandName subCommandName` - Sub Command Details
`help commandName optionName` - Option Details
`help categoryName` - Category Details
BENTOCORD_PAGINATION_NAVIGATION: Type `<` or `>` to switch pages, `x` to close, or `p[number]` to jump to a page (ex. `p10`).
BENTOCORD_PERMISSION_DENIED: Permission `{permission}` has been denied on the `{where}` level.
BENTOCORD_PERMISSION_DENIED_DEFAULT: Permission `{permission}` is denied by default. Please contact a server administrator to grant you this permission.
BENTOCORD_PERMISSION_GLOBAL_DENIED: Permission `{permission}` is denied globally. As this can only be done by a bot owner, it was likely intentional.
BENTOCORD_PERMISSION_USER_DENIED: Permission `{permission}` is globally denied for you. As this can only be done by a bot owner, it was likely intentional.
BENTOCORD_PROMPT_CHOICE: Please select one of the following choices:
BENTOCORD_PROMPT_CHOICE_OPTION: Please select one of the following choices for option `{option}`:
BENTOCORD_PROMPT_CONFIRM: Please confirm you wish to continue [y/n]:
BENTOCORD_PROMPT_MISSING_PERMISSION: It doesn't look like I have the `{permission}` Discord permission. Please grant it for a better experience.
BENTOCORD_PROMPT_OPTION: Please provide an input for option `{option}` of type `{type}`:
BENTOCORD_PROMPT_USAGE: *You may respond via message or the `r` command.*
BENTOCORD_PROMPT_VALIDATE_ERROR: **Failed to validate input. Please try again.**
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_BOT_OWNER: You are not a bot owner.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_CHANNEL_DENIED: This command cannot be executed in the current channel.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_DM: This command must be executed in a Direct Message.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_GUILD: This command must be executed in a server.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_GUILD_ADMIN: You are not a server administrator.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_GUILD_DENIED: This command cannot be executed in the current server.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_GUILD_OWNER: You are not the server owner.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_ROLE: You do not possess the required roles.
BENTOCORD_SUPPRESSOR_USER_DENIED: You are not allowed to execute this command.
